content:
Based on the new execution logs, I'll update the report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) with drop position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-17.0, -51.0) containing 4 coal and 20 iron plates
Currently inactive due to lack of fuel in mining drill

### Copper Plate Production at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0) with drop position (-20.5, -71.5)
- Stone furnace at (-20.0, -71.0) containing 2 coal and 14 copper plates
Currently inactive due to lack of fuel in mining drill

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-14.5, 15.5) facing UP
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) (out of fuel)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components
- Electric pole network starting at (-16.5, 15.5) connecting to broader network
System status:
- Water system connected and flowing
- Boiler inactive due to no fuel
- Steam engine connected to power network but no steam input

### Research Facility
- Lab containing 10 automation science packs
Currently not functioning due to lack of power

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Collection Issues
- Move within reach of resource before attempting to harvest
- Verify exact position of resources before attempting collection
- Ensure character is at correct coordinates for resource collection

### Crafting Problems
- Verify all required technologies are researched before attempting crafting
- Check if recipes are unlocked before attempting to craft
- Ensure all required ingredients are available in inventory

### Entity Extraction Issues
- Move directly adjacent to entity before attempting extraction
- Verify entity contains the item you're trying to extract
- Check if item is actually extractable from the entity type

### Fuel Management
- Implement coal collection before attempting to refuel entities
- Verify coal is in inventory before attempting to insert into entities
- Maintain minimum coal reserves for critical systems

### Power System Management
- Connect power poles in sequence to maintain network connectivity
- Ensure all power-consuming entities are within pole reach
- Verify complete power delivery chain from generator to consumers

### Entity Placement
- Check inventory for required entity before attempting placement
- Verify placement position is clear and within reach
- Ensure correct orientation for directional entities

### System Dependencies
- Maintain fuel supply for power generation
- Ensure power network is operational before adding consumers
- Keep critical production chains supplied with resources
